data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 3,029,166 who are far from you in Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Rajput Amethiya people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the county of Deoria, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 3,100,900.

We estimate Deoria has 34,110 people who might know Jesus, 37,624 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,029,166 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 34,110 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
